topic.title: Generating Documentation From the Command-Line Interface

keywords.indexterm: Editing XML Schemasgenerate documentation for XML Schemafrom command line

body.p: The script command-line parameter is the relative path to the exported XML settings file. The files which are specified with relative paths in the exported XML settings are made absolute, relative to the folder where the script is ran from.
